name: Windows Scheduled Task Created with Suspicious Action
title: Windows Scheduled Task Created with Suspicious Action
description: Detects scheduled task creation where the task action includes PowerShell, often used for persistence.
sigma_text:
title: Windows Scheduled Task Created with Suspicious Action
id: RULE-008
description: Detects scheduled task creation where the task action includes PowerShell, often used for persistence.
author: detpack-lab
status: stable
logsource:
  product: windows
  service: security
detection:
  selection:
    EventID: 4698
    TaskContent|contains:
      - powershell
      - PowerShell
  condition: selection
falsepositives:
  - Legitimate admin automation using scheduled tasks
level: medium
tags:
  - attack.t1053
  - attack.persistence
elastic_esql: FROM logs | WHERE EventID:4698 and (TaskContent:*powershell* or TaskContent:*PowerShell*)
false_positive_notes: Legitimate admin automation using scheduled tasks

tuning_knobs.name: allowlist.principal
tuning_knobs.description: Exclude known admin/automation principals that legitimately trigger this behavior.

tuning_knobs.name: allowlist.hosts
tuning_knobs.description: Exclude known management hosts or jump boxes that legitimately perform the action.
